 <g class="layer">

  <rect fill="#FF0000" height="109" id="svg_2" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="5" width="390" x="404.5" y="86.5"/>

 </g>
</svg>

en.banners_html_text: Shop closed from December, 24th to January, 2nd
